item.title: WeAreCreative
item.dc:creator: epico
item.content:encoded: [vc_row row_padding_top="155" row_padding_bottom="100"][vc_column width="1/2"][textbox title="WE ARE CREATIVE" title_color="#444444" title_fontsize="80" text_title_border="left_border" text_border_underline_color="#ffd626" text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="150"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1435652137443{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="40px"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in-right" text_animation_delay="300" css_animation="right-to-left"]Vertex is a creative multi page as well as a one page WordPress theme that is available on ThemeForest for download. It was made by EPICOMEDIA team. Features like Epico slider, custom-built portfolio created a stunning environment for users. By the use of the latest trends in web design we intended to develop a responsive yet flexible theme for those agencies that have special needs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_padding_bottom="120"][vc_column width="1/2"][custom_imagebox image_url="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" title="LIMITLESS COLORS" title_color="#272727" title_fontsize="32" box_position="right" subtitle="Plus Pre-defined Presets" subtitle_color="#272727" text_content="Predefined color presets are reachable from control panel, but it is not all, you may choose your favorite color per each element of your site by the use of a simple to use color picker." text_content_color="#6d6d6d" content_fontsize="13" bg_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.91)" border_color="#272727"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][custom_imagebox image_url="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" title="INTERACTIVE DESIGN " title_color="#272727" title_fontsize="32" box_position="right" subtitle="Excellent User Experience" subtitle_color="#272727" text_content="Interactive Design is defined as a user-oriented field of study that focuses on meaningful communication of media through cyclical and collaborative processes between people and technology." text_content_color="#6d6d6d" content_fontsize="13" bg_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.91)" border_color="#272727"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: FLEXIBLE LAYOUT
item.dc:creator: epico
item.content:encoded: One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin. He lay on his armour-like back, and if he lifted his head a little he could see his brown belly, slightly domed and divided by arches into stiff sections. The bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment. His many legs, pitifully thin compared with the size of the rest of him, waved about helplessly as he looked. "What's happened to me?" he thought. It wasn't a dream. His room, a proper human room although a little too small, lay peacefully between its four familiar walls. A collection of textile samples lay spread out on the table - Samsa was a travelling salesman - and above it there hung a picture that he had recently cut out of an illustrated magazine and housed in a nice, gilded frame. It showed a lady fitted out with a fur hat and fur boa who sat upright, raising a heavy fur muff that covered the whole of her lower arm towards the viewer. Gregor then turned to look out the window at the dull weather.

item.title: One Major Rule
item.dc:creator: epico
item.content:encoded: One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin. He lay on his armour-like back, and if he lifted his head a little he could see his brown belly, slightly domed and divided by arches into stiff sections. The bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment. His many legs, pitifully thin compared with the size of the rest of him, waved about helplessly as he looked. "What's happened to me?" he thought. It wasn't a dream. His room, a proper human room although a little too small, lay peacefully between its four familiar walls. A collection of textile samples lay spread out on the table - Samsa was a travelling salesman - and above it there hung a picture that he had recently cut out of an illustrated magazine and housed in a nice, gilded frame. It showed a lady fitted out with a fur hat and fur boa who sat upright

item.title: Simplicity
item.dc:creator: epico
item.content:encoded: One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin. He lay on his armour-like back, and if he lifted his head a little he could see his brown belly, slightly domed and divided by arches into stiff sections. The bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment. His many legs, pitifully thin compared with the size of the rest of him, waved about helplessly as he looked. "What's happened to me?"
